name: Teva Original Universal Sandals - Men's
description: Their comfort and durability started the technical sandal revolution. Now the original Tevas are back, complete with classic webbing closures and shock-absorbing footbeds.Uppers are polyester webbing for fast drying.Hook-and-loop closures allow quick, secure fastening.Universal strap system fits all feet.EVA midsoles provide cushioning.Outsoles are rubber for long lasting grip.
